1.details: Choose ProductAI Pro as the MVP product. Define core features: RICE Framework Automation, User Story Generator, Roadmap Intelligence, Sprint Planning Assistant, Stakeholder Communication Templates, Competitive Analysis Dashboard, OKR Alignment Engine. Create detailed product specifications and user stories.

2.details: Design comprehensive technical architecture including: Frontend (React + TypeScript), Backend (Supabase), AI Integration (OpenAI API, Anthropic), Database Schema, Authentication System, API Design, File Storage, Real-time Features, and Infrastructure components.

3.details: Initialize React project, configure Supabase backend, setup database tables and schemas, implement authentication system, create edge functions for AI processing, setup file storage for user data and templates.

4.details: Implement RICE Framework Automation (prioritization scoring), User Story Generator (AI-powered story creation), Roadmap Intelligence (visual roadmap builder), Sprint Planning Assistant (task breakdown), Competitive Analysis Dashboard (competitor data integration), OKR Alignment Engine (goal setting).

5.details: Create responsive dashboard, implement feature workflows, design data visualization components, build form interfaces for user input, create templates and library views, implement export and sharing features.

6.details: Setup user data persistence, implement project management integrations (Jira, Asana, Linear APIs), create template library, implement data backup and recovery, add user preference settings.

7.details: Implement comprehensive testing suite, test AI feature accuracy, verify integrations, perform user experience testing, security testing, performance optimization, and load testing.

8.details: Deploy to production environment, setup monitoring and analytics, prepare user documentation, create onboarding flow, setup billing system, and prepare marketing landing page.
